<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Vulture Rat](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2076)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Travel Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=141) pg. 99

**Perception** +5; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +2, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -3
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +3 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 8

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 10 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [deadly d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 piercing plus filth fever

**Filth Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) The [sickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34) and [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) conditions from filth fever don't improve on their own until the disease is cured. **Saving Throw** DC 14 Fortitude; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1d4 hours), **Stage 2** sickened 1 (1 day), **Stage 3** sickened 1 and [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) (1 day), **Stage 4** unconscious (1 day), **Stage 5** dead

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-86" />
name: Vulture Rat
